timeline.bodyText: this method is need for full screen video button to appear in players
timeline.author: jcesarmobile

replies.bodyText:
This was a change from this PR: #2917
My understanding is a method that only calls the parent class's method can simply be removed and it will use the parent class's implementation.
replies.author: imhoffd

replies.bodyText: I only know that if you remove it, the button disappear, if you add it back, the button appears, so despite it only calls the super method, looks like it's needed for the full screen button to appear and work.
replies.author: jcesarmobile
